item.title: The King of the Video Games
item.description: Fortune is a 12 year old boy and he lives in a flat with his Mum, Dad and Brother. The flat is small with spray paint on the wall. Fortune’s family doesn’t have a lot of money which is funny given his name. He dreams of being a YouTuber but he does not have any equipment to get started. Fortune also wants an iPad so he can play video games but he doesn’t have enough money.
